# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the webpage this item represents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get }
```

## Getting the Page-Specific Information

- **url**: The URL of the webpage this item represents.

items.description: The URL of the webpage this item represents.
items.name: url

title: title
